about_the_game:
TWO MAIN ACTIONS

Swipe to move and click to interact in an open-world survival crafting experience made through cards. Handle your energy tactically to survive as long as possible. Craft weapons, build your base and be prepared to explore a world full of secrets.



RANDOMLY GENERATED WORLD

You will always see 5 cards in front of you representing each element of a procedurally generated world, so each adventure will be different. Choose tactically how you move and where to spend energy.


GATHER RESOURCES

You can collect resources by interacting with the central card and dropping its interaction points to 0. But be careful: you will need tools such as an axe to chop down trees or a pickaxe to mine.


SURVIVE

Keep your hunger points in check: cook and eat to survive as much as possible and sleep to regain energy. Don't be fooled by the eye-catching colours: Swappy World is a survival experience that will challenge you.


WHEN THE NIGHT FALLS..

When night falls you will only be able to see the central card. The night is full of monsters and dangers, do not wander around if you are not properly prepared. Anyway, you can use a torch to light your path and reveal more cards.


HOSTILE WORLD

Don't be fooled by the colourful world: you could easily find fierce animals and monsters that will easily defeat you if you are not prepared. As you explore you may discover new biomes that not only hide new resources but are also populated by increasingly strong monsters. Be on your guard!

CRAFT YOUR EQUIP

Before you set off on your adventure, create your equipment through the resources you have recovered. An axe for example, will help you to get more wood. When you have the right resources try building some weapons and armor to defend yourself, they will be essential!

BUILD YOUR BASE

In an empty card, you can construct a building. Click to place resources. Once completed you can interact and get new craftable items, cook in a campfire or sleep in a bed.

CREATE YOUR MOD SOON AVAILABLE

FEATURES

  • Just 2 mechanics give life to dozens of features
  • Responsive turn-based mechanics so you can play swiftly or strategically
  • Hundreds of craftable tools, items and armours.
  • dozens of different cards representing: world resources, animals, monsters and buildings to interact with.
  • 10 different biomes to explore.
  • Face the Boss found in each biome, discover hidden bosses in an experience full of secrets
  • A travel experience in a parallel world will place the player at the centre of a narrative that breaks the fourth wall.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Compatible with both Apple Silicon or Intel chip. Intel Core i5-5350U (2 * 1800) or equivalent; Intel Core i5-2400S (4 * 2500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 or equivalent; Radeon HD 6750M (512 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13 or later
  • Processor: Compatible with both Apple Silicon or Intel chip. Intel Core i5-6500 (4 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 (2048 VRAM) equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
